sentence: “All branches of government in this state must come together to provide full assurance of the integrity of our elections and answer every outstanding question,” said a report from Attorney General Mark Brnovich.
title: 2020 ‘election fraud’ in Arizona ‘raises questions,’ AG reports

sentence: This is according to Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich, who recently published an interim report that was sent to the president of the Arizona Senate, Karen Fann, relaying the findings of a forensic election audit.
author: Cassie B.
title: Criminal prosecutions for Maricopa County election fraud are coming, according to Arizona AG’s interim report

sentence: Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich has sent notice to the president of the state Senate, Karen Fann, with his finding in an interim report pertaining to a forensic ballot audit conducted in the months after the election in Maricopa County, and in his report, he has called for criminal prosecutions, according to 100 Percent Fed Up.
author: JD Heyes
title: Arizona AG Brnovich sends notice to state Senate, says criminal prosecutions coming in relation to 2020 election
